course_title: Innovative Leadership & Policy in Advanced Nursing Practice Role
class_notes:
This section is for MSN APRN students who have not started the NRSG 589 & 599 sequence.
Online synchronous sessions every other week: 8/30,9/13,9/27,10/4,10/18,11/1,11/8, and 12/6 from 9a-10:560a. (November is an exception due to simulations) total of 8 synchronous classes. Remainder are asynchronous.
course_description: This course provides students with a foundation for advanced practice nursing (APN) leadership. The course focuses on the principles and standards of APN and the policy and regulatory environments that impact practice and care. Emphasis is on inter-professional collaboration in healthcare.
sections: Class Nbr: 4266, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
